questions.question: This sign indicates 'No U-turn.'
questions.explanation: This sign indicates that U-turns are not allowed. Drivers should proceed straight and not make a U-turn at this location.

questions.question: This sign indicates 'Merge ahead.'
questions.explanation: This sign indicates that there is a merging lane ahead. Drivers should prepare to merge with the traffic in the other lane.

questions.question: This sign indicates 'Two-way traffic ahead.'
questions.explanation: This sign indicates that the road ahead is divided, and there will be two-way traffic. Drivers should be cautious and stay in their designated lane.

questions.question: This sign indicates 'Divided highway ends.'
questions.explanation: This sign indicates that the divided highway ends ahead. The road will no longer be divided, and drivers should be prepared for changes in traffic patterns.

questions.question: This sign indicates 'Bicycle lane ahead.'
questions.explanation: This sign indicates that there is a designated lane for bicycles ahead. Drivers should be aware of cyclists and give them space when passing or merging.

questions.question: This sign indicates 'No U-turn.'
questions.explanation: This sign indicates that U-turns are not allowed at this location. Drivers should proceed straight and not make a U-turn.

questions.question: This sign indicates 'No parking.'
questions.explanation: This sign indicates that parking is not allowed in this area. Drivers should not leave their vehicles unattended in the designated zone.

questions.question: This sign indicates 'Lane ends ahead.'
questions.explanation: This sign indicates that the lane ahead will end. Drivers should merge with the traffic in the other lane.

questions.question: This sign indicates 'Emergency vehicle crossing.'
questions.explanation: This sign indicates that there may be emergency vehicles crossing the road ahead. Drivers should be prepared to yield and give right-of-way to emergency vehicles.

questions.question: This sign indicates 'Pedestrian crossing ahead.'
questions.explanation: This sign indicates that there is a pedestrian crossing ahead. Drivers should be cautious and yield to pedestrians who are crossing the road.
